Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes the community development financial institution disability housing program within the New York state urban development corporation
Summary: Establishes the community development financial institution disability housing program within the New York state urban development corporation.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to establishing a community development financial institution disability housing program
